alert.note: Alert for Gonzales; Guadalupe; Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 8:47AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Guadalupe, northeastern Karnes, southwestern Gonzales and northeastern Wilson Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 847 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gillett, or near Kosciusko, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kosciusko, Nixon, Smiley, Gillett, Pandora and Leesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
